Text: Can anyone confirm this working on a phat Lite-on drive with LT+2.0? (So far, the NTSC version has not worked, Nor has Soul Calibur 5, or Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning)

agbx360 (v1.0.6) is giving me the error message that "ffxiii2.iso isn't recognized as an XBOX 360 ISO or Stealth file!"  Anyone else seeing this, and should I be concerned about it?  I am always hesitant to burn an image which fails the abgx check.
   Also, I am getting the same error with the swag release as well.  This is the only game I have ever had not be recognized.
